Crypto [[Investment instruments]] | [[Crypto Timeline]] Ideas and thoughts (not for Notion) 2022.08.21 What goes up must come down Really don’t get drawn in by the hype, if ETH surges up, it will come down equally quickly, when will I learn this #lesson?
